Articles.Content:
KSP 0.25 with the following mods: Toolbar, DMagic Orbital Science, Engineer, KAS, masTerTorch, MechJeb2, Nereid (Final Frontier), NovaPunch2 (only the stackable parachutes and the nuke engines), SCANsat, TextureReplacer.

Career mode, normal difficulty and no admin building guys selected I get zero reputation. Contracts show as giving rep, but none of it is recorded/kept and shown in the reputation meter top center.

I took out several mods; FF, MJ, Engineer, Toolbar to see if any of those changed things. Nada.

Anyone else having rep issues?
So no one else is having the issue of not receiving reputation at all?
